item.title: Where do i add this for the text
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Search for server.playerHandler.messageToAll = killerz.playerName+" has killed "+playerName+", "+killerz.playerName+" now has "+killerz.pkpoints+" pk points and "+killerz.killcount+" kills!"; and add it right under it.

txt4 = “OMFG K0!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;

where do i add that? its to make it so when you kill someone you say “OMFG K0!”

but ive done it for when you die because it is easy you search for “oh dear”

but im using pirate island which is my un-released source and its based on pimp

thanks
